<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Floor and building columns have been added to the reservation table in order to support now mobile native.</description>
        <name>Add floor and building to reservation</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[fillFloorAndBuildingOnReservation();

function fillFloorAndBuildingOnReservation() {
	var logs = [];
	var reservationGr = new GlideRecord(WSDConstants.TABLES.RoomsReservation.name);
	logs.push('Starting Add floor and building to reservation fix script in sn_wsd_rsv');
	logs.push('-------------------------------------------');
	reservationGr.addEncodedQuery('active=true^buildingISEMPTY^ORfloorISEMPTY');
	reservationGr.query();

	while(reservationGr.next()) {
		logs.push('Found reservation with missing floor and or building: ' + reservationGr.number);
		var reservationLocation = reservationGr.workplace_location.getRefRecord();
		reservationGr.floor = reservationLocation.getValue('floor');
		reservationGr.building = reservationLocation.getValue('building');
		logs.push('Setting floor: ' + reservationLocation.getDisplayValue('floor') + ' and building ' + reservationLocation.getDisplayValue('building') +  'for reservation '+ reservationGr.number);
		reservationGr.setWorkflow('false');
		var updateResult = reservationGr.update();
		if(WSDUtils.safeBool(updateResult)) {
			logs.push('Successfully updated reservation with new floor and building values: ' + reservationGr.number);
			logs.push('-------------------------------------------');
			continue;
		}
		logs.push("Failed to update reservation with new floor and building values: " + reservationGr.number);
		logs.push('-------------------------------------------');
	}
	logs.push('Operation finished');
	gs.info(logs.join("\n"));
}]]></script>
